abilities.name: Reborn Mastermind
abilities.rule: Once per battle round, one model from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that usage of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Overlord
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re‐roll a Wound roll of 1. While that unit is below its Starting Strength, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re‐roll the Wound roll instead.

abilities.name: Shadow Field
abilities.rule: You cannot re‐roll invulnerable saving throws made for the bearer. The first time an invulnerable saving throw made for the bearer is failed, until the end of the battle, the bearer has no invulnerable save.

wargear_abilities.name: Shadow Field
wargear_abilities.rule: You cannot re‐roll invulnerable saving throws made for the bearer. The first time an invulnerable saving throw made for the bearer is failed, until the end of the battle, the bearer has no invulnerable save.

wargear_options: ■ This model’s splinter pistol can be replaced with 1 blast pistol.
